plugin.name: webthumbs
plugin.author: Sven Haiges
plugin.title: Create preview image urls for websites
plugin.description: \ This plugin creates preview URLs using the bluga.net webthumbs service. You can pass a URL into the webthumbsService and it will return a preview URL which returns an preview image to the URL you passed. You will need to sign up at webthumb.bluga.net.
